title: Aiming for a £1k passive income? Here’s how much you’d need in an ISA
description: Mark Hartley does the maths to calculate how much an investor would need in an ISA when aiming for a monthly passive income. But which stocks to pick?The post Aiming for a £1k passive income? Here’s how much you’d need in an ISA appeared first on The Motley Fool UK.

title: We May Have Arrived at the 'Marco Rubio Moment'

The secretary of state is not generating the splashiest or most controversial headlines, and that's part of the point. title: UNSC welcomes Qatar's mediation efforts between DRC Government and Congo River Alliance

title: Ukrainians revive traditional wheat craft during wartime Christmas
description: In Ukraine, a centuries old Christmas tradition is gaining renewed attention. As the war continues, some Ukrainians are turning to long standing cultural practices rooted in family life and rural history. In the city of Lviv, the weaving of didukhs is becoming an increasingly visible part of the festive season. (AP video by Andriy Popovych)

Staff shortages blamed for Island Line disruption TODAY
description: Isle of Wight train services have been hit by staff shortages today (Sunday, December 21).

title: Rs 2 cr siphoned off from India's Permanent Mission in Geneva; CBI books accounts officer
description: A former accounts officer at India's Permanent Mission in Geneva has been accused of siphoning over 2 lakh Swiss francs (around Rs 2 crore) to fund crypto-gambling. Mohit allegedly replaced vendor QR codes with his own, diverting payments to his personal account. The scam was uncovered by auditors investigating duplicate payments.

title: PM Modi Pays Tribute To Martyrs Of Assam Agitation At Memorial In Guwahati
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday paid homage to martyrs of the Assam Agitation, a movement against illegal immigrants, at the 'Swahid Smarak Kshetra' here.
